title: Is there a way i can send Skin ideas, like Dota 2 has or something?
body:
Hi, I've been looking at a few Champions and i can see some wonderful opportunities that Skin designers have overlooked and i was wondering if there was a way i could suggest them? Thanks. 
{{champion:268}}

replies.body:
Here on boards is the best way to get community feedback. Certain Rioter's do hang out on the boards as well, however you'll find that most skin suggestions go relatively unnoticed. It's a combination of being a small community here on OCE boards, and most skins being suggested elsewhere at some point.

You might have better luck posting in the NA concepts and creations board.
